faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common queries about Motion Tracking

items.title: Can Motion Tracking follow any type of object?
items.description: Yes! Our AI can track various moving subjects, including people, vehicles, and dynamic elements within your videos.

items.title: Is there a limit on video length for tracking?
items.description: Currently, videos can be up to 20 minutes long for processing, suitable for most projects. Longer videos may be edited in segments.

items.title: What about commercial usage of my edited videos?
items.description: All users can freely use their edited content for commercial purposes, provided they hold a valid subscription plan.

items.title: How does WaveSpeed ensure processing security?
items.description: All video edits are processed in your browser using secure WebAssembly technology. Your files stay private and are not stored on our servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI's Motion Tracking now and see the difference. No sign-up required.
